post_detail.title: PromaxBDA 2013
post_detail.description: The offical App for the 2013 PromaxBDA Conference was once again lovingly created by Click 3X. The app includes the conference schedule, as well as speaker, exhibitor, and sponsor information and social integration through Facebook and Twitter. If you're attending the show be sure to download it for the iPhone and iPad by searching 'PromaxBDA' on the Apple iTunes App or by searching 'PromaxBDA' on Google Play for Android.
